abstract: This paper describes our experiences with evolving a system infrastructure while continuing to support new functionality. In it we explore the architecture, technology decisions made, and difficulties encountered in porting a core business application while it is being used and extended to support the enterprise.

authors.name: David J. Arnone
authors.affiliation: PaineWebber, 1200 Harbor Blvd./1st Floor, Weehawken, New Jersey

title: Porting a core CGI workflow system onto a WAS platform while being used and extended to support the enterprise
